column5: Okay, they were just out for a fun day on the water. But at 1:25 you can sure tell he's a fisherman.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z43b13R1lHI
What a bunch of Bull! That guy and a scale have never been in the same place at any time, while fishing......
3 maybe 4 lbs hahahahah.  Ah well he was stoked, good for him.
Wasn't so long ago that a bass that size would have been a personal best for me. Not meaning to make fun of the guy, but it just seemed a bit comical.
I think I hear the other guy say "pound and a half" near the end. He's closer but I'm not sure he'd win the showcase showdown either. Nice day fishin' with family though.
This video applies to quite a few on this board as well, lol
What's that saying about fisherman? How can you tell when they're lying - their lips are moving  LOL. Just don't get caught on camera doing it!

That is like the fish my dad has mounted in his basement, he swears its a 5lb and I thought so as well then I started fishing on own and caught a real 5lb  it might be a 3lb on a slow day but I could never tell him
Bud couldn't drive that dart into him fast enough lol
The guy in the back actually says 4 and a half at the end. He has a smirk on his face though.
On some waters here they need to be 15 inches to be legal, not sure that one would have made it.
I like the dudes shirt.   I had a feeling you would B
Maybe we can get him a deeper net too!!
Lol. We all know people like that...  That in mind he may not know any better...  Hopefully he's not a member with everyone teasing him
